snippet.title: AP News in Brief at 8:58 p.m. EDT
snippet.description: US, Russia trade warnings on Ukraine; Russia told it has 'days, not weeks' to abide by accord

snippet.title: Mexico City pays tribute to Gabriel Garcia Marquez
snippet.description: The city that the writer called home honors its late resident.

snippet.title: Mexico food labeling rules draw fire on sugar
snippet.description: Mexico's new food labeling rules were supposed to help fight an obesity epidemic, but activists and experts said Monday they may actually encourage the public to consume high levels of sugar.

snippet.title: Halliburton posts $622M in 1st-qtr net income
snippet.description: Halliburton made money in the first quarter on rising revenue in the Middle East and Asia, and the CEO said Monday that he sensed an upturn in the North American market.

snippet.title: Hasbro posts 1Q profit, sales of girls' toys rise
snippet.description: Hasbro returned to profitability in its first quarter, driven by sales of girls' toys such as My Little Pony and Nerf Rebelle. The prior-year results were dragged down by restructuring charges.

snippet.title: Loudoun County and Fauquier County health calendar
snippet.description: Listings include blood drives, support groups, mental health services and resources for new parents.

snippet.title: Wonkbook: 8 million is not the only Obamacare number that counts
snippet.description: Here's why Obamacare is not just one number.

snippet.title: Cuba home woes endure despite real-estate reform
snippet.description: The residents of 308 Oquendo Street were jolted awake in the middle of the night by violent shaking and a noise that they likened to a freight train, or an exploding bomb.

snippet.title: Pope's Easter Message 'Urbi et Orbi'
snippet.description: The following is the text of the Vatican's official English-language translation of Pope Francis' Easter Sunday "Urbi et Orbi" (Latin for 'to the city and to the world') read by him in Italian from the central balcony of St. Peter's Basilica.

snippet.title: USDA orders farms to report pig virus infections
snippet.description: Farms stricken with a deadly pig virus must report outbreaks as part of a new program to help monitor and possibly control the spread of the disease, the federal government announced Friday.
